question: Which of the following country opens dual-use highway to Nepal through Tibet?
explanation: China opened a dual use highway in Tibet to the Nepal border which could be used for civilian and defence purposes, in China. The highway is 40.4 km long and 25 m wide. It has 4 double lanes. It is classified a first-tier highway. It connects Xigaze airport and Xigaze city centre in Tibet. It has a short section linking the national highway to the Nepal border.
